io.digdag.standards.operator.state

Interface TaskState


  • @Value.Immutable
public interface TaskState

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <T> T constant(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Class<T> type, com.google.common.base.Supplier<T> supplier)
      Store a constant value (once) in the TaskState.
      default TaskState nestedState(java.lang.String key)
      Get a nested TaskState.
      static TaskState of(io.digdag.client.config.Config root)
      Create a new TaskState based on the raw Config root task state.
      static TaskState of(io.digdag.spi.TaskRequest request)
      Create a new TaskState for a TaskRequest.
      io.digdag.client.config.Config params()
      Get the raw params Config for this TaskState.
      default io.digdag.spi.TaskExecutionException pollingTaskExecutionException(int interval)
      Create a new TaskExecutionException with using the root task state.
      io.digdag.client.config.Config root()
      The raw root task state Config.

    • Method Detail

      • root

        io.digdag.client.config.Config root()
        The raw root task state Config. The Config returned by params() is some subtree of this root state. This root state should be used when throwing a polling TaskExecutionException.

      • params

        io.digdag.client.config.Config params()
        Get the raw params Config for this TaskState. This should be used when mutating (nested) task state but not when throwing a polling TaskExecutionException.

      • nestedState

        default TaskState nestedState(java.lang.String key)
        Get a nested TaskState.

      • of

        static TaskState of(io.digdag.client.config.Config root)
        Create a new TaskState based on the raw Config root task state.

      • of

        static TaskState of(io.digdag.spi.TaskRequest request)
        Create a new TaskState for a TaskRequest.

      • pollingTaskExecutionException

        default io.digdag.spi.TaskExecutionException pollingTaskExecutionException(int interval)
        Create a new TaskExecutionException with using the root task state.

      • constant

        default <T> T constant(java.lang.String key,
                       java.lang.Class<T> type,
                       com.google.common.base.Supplier<T> supplier)
        Store a constant value (once) in the TaskState. If the value is not yet present in the TaskState, a value is retrieved from the supplier, inserted into the state and a polling TaskExecutionException is thrown to immediately persist it. Note that the supplier might be called more than once in case of system failure.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the constant value.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the constant value.
        type - The type of the constant value.
        supplier - A supplier that will be called to get a value to store in the state if not yet present.
        Returns:
        The constant value.
